column1: full, on middle stump, and angling in. Fended to the leg side
length ball, on middle, and flicked off the back foot to midwicket
full, on middle stump. Big stride forward and defended
full, on leg stump, and fended off the front foot again
full outside off, and he caresses a drive to the fielder at long off. Off the mark!
full on leg stump, and nudged fine. Stopped by Mahmdullah at short fine leg
juicy full toss on middle, and he mistimes a straight drive to mid-on
length ball on leg stump, and Fakhar misses the flick. Hits his front pad, and they appeal for lbw. Not given. Probably pitched outside leg stump, in retrospect
length ball on middle, and he rides the bounce to fend towards the leg side
length ball, wide outside off, and slapped off the front foot past point
length ball, on middle. Blocked off the back foot
length ball, on leg stump, and guided off his hips past short fine leg. Chase for the man at deep backward square
full, outside off and turning away. Tapped with soft hands to point
length ball on his pads, and worked away to deep midwicket
full, on off and he takes a big stride forward to defend
sliced and it drops in front of wide long off! Full and wide outside off, and Fakhar comes down the ground to play it over extra cover, but finds the bat's outside edge. Safe for now though
length ball, on middle, and defended with soft hands off the back foot

full, on middle stump. Pushed to mid-off, and Fakhar is halfway down for the single. Notices Imam is ball-watching, and then has to scamper back. A better pick-up from the mid-off fielder and Fakhar would've been gone
length ball, on middle stump. Pushed off his pads to mid-on
length ball, on middle and angling away. Tapped to cover for a quick single, and they need to hurry! Direct hit and Imam was gone
length ball, originating on leg stump but angling across. Punched to cover
knee-high full toss on off stump. Fakhar mistimes a leg-side swipe to midwicket
length ball outside off, and he guides a checked cut-shot to point
length ball, outside leg stump, and flicked off his hips past the diving short fine leg fielder
full outside off, and turning away. Driven to mid-off
full, on off, and the attempted drive is inside-edged onto his pads
full, on middle. He takes a huge stride forward and taps it down to mid-on
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Stopped by the fielder at cover point however
full just outside off, and defended with the bat's open face. Goes down to short third man
full, on off, and the attempted defense takes an inside-edge to square leg
length ball, on leg stump, and clipped to square leg
attempted yorker, on off stump. Dug away, well enough to mid-off
full outside off, and he tries to drive through the covers. Toe-ends it to mid-off again
length ball on off and angling away. Fakhar throws his hands at it, slices a shot over point, and it lands well short of the man at fine leg
full outside off, and he presses forward for a drive
crunched! Hold that pose, Imam. Full, outside off and he prods forward to meet the ball under his eyes. Driven through the infield
full, on middle stump. Defended with soft hands
length ball, on middle. He rocks back to punch down the ground
full, on off stump. Big stride forward to defend
full, on leg stump. And clipped to square leg. Imam wants the run, but Fakhar says 'no'
length ball, on middle stump. Defended
full, on off stump. He blocks with soft hands once again. Another accurate over from Mehidy
length ball, angling away. And cut square. Stopped by the fielder at cover point
taken at point! Full, wide outside off, and he tries to smack this over point. Slices it, and straight to Mehidy. He's a gun fielder
full, on off stump. And defended to mid-on
attempted yorker, on middle stump. Flicked off his toes to deep backward square. Races away for four
fullish, just outside off and staying low. Babar tried to fend, but the ball whizzed past his outside edge
full, on off, and driven straight. Misfield by Mashrafe at mid-on, concedes one run but saves three
full, on off, and turning in. Fended to the leg side
length ball, outside off, and cut square off the back foot. Man in the deep though
full, on leg stump. Flicked away to square leg
full, on middle, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
full, just outside off stump. And pushed to mid-off
full, on middle, and drilled to wide long on
full outside off, and slapped in front of square. Stopped at cover
back of a length, on middle. Babar rides the bounce and glances it square to deep midwicket
back of a length, wide outside off. Fended off the back foot to point
full, on middle stump, and Imam plays a guided flick to the leg side for one
length ball, angling away from Babar, and he leans into a square-cut. No infielder bothers moving
full, on middle. And tapped to the leg side. Fizz gives the ball a chase, but they manage the single
short of a length ball on fifth stump at 124 kph, punched off the back foot through cover to the sweeper.
good length ball on fourth stump at 128 kph, opens the face to run it to third man.
fullish length on fourth stump, leans forward to prod and inside edges through midwicket.
short of a length well wide of off, runs it off the open face to third man again.
full on middle stump, clipped off the pads behind square well wide of deep fine leg for a pair.
fullish length on middle and leg, clipped through the on side to deep midwicket.

edge! Safe! Short of a length by the Fizz angled across on sixth stump, the slip fielder for the left-armer had gone very wide more to a second slip and this splits him and Mushfiqur very fine to the third man rope.
short of a length tighter on fourth stump, goes back to cut and is beaten.
short on sixth stump, cuts hard but straight to point.
bouncer angled in on off stump at 129 kph, doesn't bounce as high as anticipated but still well ducked under by Babar.
fullish length on fourth stump, tried to follow up the bouncer with a pitched up ball but Babar sees it off with a forward prod.
short of a length on fifth stump at 134 kph, punched off the back foot to backward point.
short of a length on off, guided delicately just behind square, wide enough to allow a single before a diving stop by backward point to prevent more.
short of a length on the stumps, tip and run into silly point and Mashrafe can't get the legs going fast enough to win a footrace with Imam.
slower ball on a fullish length on off stump, Imam keeps the hands back to defend to the off side.
good length ball but plenty of width wide outside off at 119 kph, cut firmly to the cover sweeper.
fullish length ball on middle and leg at 125 kph, flicked behind square for a long one. Thought about a second but cut off by a charging deep fine leg.
fullish length on fifth stump, Imam goes back to nudge behind point but can't get it wide enough of the fielder to allow a run.
but he makes an unremarkable start here! Fullish length ball angled down leg side, Mushfiqur can't shuffle across to prevent it being five wides.
fullish length on off, nudged in front of point.
good length ball on off, flicked off the back foot through midwicket.
fullish length on fourth stump, leans forward to defend, inside edge through square leg.
fullish length on fifth stump at 76 kph, nudged softly just wide of Mushfiqur into short third man.
uses the feet to meet a full ball on fourth stump and chip through mid-on.
full on the legs, clipped behind square.
fullish length ball, pushed through extra cover and they scamper a well-judged two before the sweeper can charge in.
short of a length wide outside off at 129 kph, cut hard straight to point.
fullish length on middle and off, Imam shuffled across to clip behind square. Shakib at short fine leg gives chase and cuts it off at the rope to save one run.
short on off stump, defended on the back foot at 127 kph back down the pitch softly towards mid-on.
short of a length on fourth stump, guided behind point to deep third man.
slower ball on off stump at 117 kph, Imam with very soft hands tucks this into the ring at midwicket gently enough to sprint another sharp two.
short of a length on middle at 87 kph, goes back to punch to long-on.
good length ball pitching on off and spinning sharply into the body, flicked through square leg.
good length ball on the stumps, goes back to punch to long-on.
good length ball on fourth stump, clipped to midwicket in the ring.
good length ball on fourth stump at 84 kph, skids straight on and punched to long-on.
flighted full on off at 75 kph, defended to cover on the front foot.
good length ball on fourth stump, run off the back foot to third man.
good length ball on off at 128 kph, goes back to defend to the off side.
fullish length on middle and leg at 128 kph, flicked wide of deep midwicket circling left on the rope and they come back for an easy pair.
fullish length ball on middle, defended back to Mashrafe.
fullish length ball, driven to the cover sweeper.
full on the legs, clipped behind square.
fullish length dragged wide on 6th/7th stump, Babar aborts a drive coming down the pitch beaten in flight and it goes off the pads in the air toward point.
good length ball defended.
fullish length, tried to push into cover but no gap.
fullish length, clipped through the leg side.
flighted on off at 81 kph, defended to backward point.
flatter on middle stump at 86 kph, goes back to punch straight back to Shakib, slight misfield but hustles behind the stumps to collect on the second effort.
fullish length wide on sixth stump, driven square behind point and deep third man has to cover a lot of ground, can't deny a second.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back to punch to long-on.
fullish length on fourth stump, clipped straight to Mehidy at midwicket in the ring.
short of a length angled into off, flicked to deep midwicket. Slight misfield on the rope during a tumbling stop allows the second run.
fullish length on middle and leg, clipped behind square.
short of a length on leg, goes back to clip through midwicket.
fullish length on fourth stump, goes back to punch left of Shakib, but fielded off his own bowling.
good length ball, uses his feet to nudge this off middle stump into midwicket for a tight run.
good length on fifth stump, goes back to cut to cover sweeper.
fullish length on fourth stump, goes back to punch to long-on.
good length ball defended to cover.
fullish length on fifth stump quicker at 86 kph, mistimed drive back down the pitch.
length ball, on off from around the wicket. Pulled off the back foot but stopped at midwicket
full, just outside off. Blocked
full outside off, and dabbed with soft hands to cover. They scamper across
length ball outside off, and turning inwards. Flicked to the leg side
half-tracker on middle that stays slightly low. Muscled to deep midwicket
another pull muscled to cow corner. Offbreak landing on off stump
full, on off, and worked off his toes to the leg side
length ball, just outside off. Punched down the ground
length ball, on off, and nudged off his pads to deep midwicket. Team 100. Just 350 more to go
full, just outside off. Tapped to cover and they scamper across for a single. Imam slides into his crease, lucky it was't a direct hit
length ball, outside off and sliding further away. Cut to deep point
length ball, just outside off, and punched down the ground to long on
full, on off stump. Big stride forward and blocked
length ball outside off, but turning inwards. Pulled off the back foot to midwicket
full, on off, and skidding through. Punched to mid-on
tossed up, nearly a yorker on leg stump. Dug down to mid-off, but can't pinch the single
length ball, on off, and he backs away before caressing a back-foot punch through the covers! Elegance personified. Another half-century for him
full, just outside off, and he skips down the ground to long on
full-ish, outside off and turning away from the right-hander. Cut square to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
length ball, on off and turning away. Guided to point
length ball, outside off, and punched to cover
full outside off, and he skips down the ground before defending to cover
length ball, on off, and he rocks back before whipping a shot to deep midwicket
full, on off, dipping in late. Fended towards the non-striker
tossed up on middle stump. Babar gets his back leg out of the way, and drills to long on for one
full, on off from around the wicket. He skips down the wicket and drives to long off for a walking single
length ball, on middle, and he backs away to pull. Ball stays low, and he under-edges into his boots
nearly clips off stump! Sharp offbreak, turning in from over the wicket. Babar tries to chop this down, but nearly played on
full, on off, and he uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball. Driven to long on
length ball, just outside off, and he rocks back to flat-bat a shot. Mistimed to long on. Halfway done
back of a length, on middle, and he rides the bounce to flick square. Finds deep midwicket
length ball just outside off, and he opens the bat's face to chop it down to short third man
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square. Dropped at point by Mosaddek. Ball did fly fast, but it was at a comfortable height at his left. Bread and butter for a fielder placed at point though
length ball, outside off, and he cuts square. Finds Mosaddek again, who has a frustrated throw at the bowler's end
length ball, just outside off stump. Confidently punched to extra cover
back of a length, on off, and pulled along the ground behind square. Saifuddin's diving effort in the deep.... goes in vain
full, just outside off, but Babar comes down the ground to meet the ball, and then drills a drive through the cover region
yorker, on off, well dug out. Ball rolls down to long on
length ball, wide outside off, and he muscles a cut behind square. Saifuddin in the deep prepares to pick up, but the ball goes through his hands! Another free four for Pakistan

edged past the keeper! Full outside off, and turning away. Tries to drive, but it takes the edge past the keeper's gloves. Chase for short third man. Fifty for Imam but he doesn't know! OK, now he does - a muted celebration
full, on off, and turning across the batsman to go down the leg side. Sharp turn!
edged! And this goes down as a drop. Length ball, on middle, and turning across Babar. He looks to defend, but the outside edge hits the keeper's left knee. He's in a bit of pain, despite the pad
full toss on middle, smacked to long on
length ball outside off, and guided with the bat's open face to third man
back of a length, just outside off. He plays this late, running it down to third man too
length ball, on middle, and some elite whippage from Babar. Off the back foot, and Sarkar - at deep midwicket - can't cut it off either
back of a length, outside off, and left alone
full, on leg stump. Defended

appeal for lbw but not given. Length ball, on leg stump, and Babar flicks it off his pads to the leg side. They scamper for a single, so keeper has a shy at the stumps. Hits the batsman's end, but Imam was in. No review either
length delivery outside off stump, but turning in sharply. Punched off the back foot to long on
full, just outside off, and defended with soft hands
full, on leg stump. Driven past the non-striker, but they settle for just one
full, on off and he comes down the ground to work the ball into the gap near mid-off
full, on off, and whipped to long on for a single
length ball outside off, and turning away. Cut square to deep point
full, just outside off. Driven to mid-off, and they scamper across for one
shottt! Length ball, on off, and he swivels to play a grounded pull to cow corner
full, on leg stump. Clipped to deep square leg for a walking single
back of a length, on middle, and he rides the bounce to pull. Not timed superbly, but still manage to take a single
back of a length, on middle, and he hammers a pull from near his helmet past deep backward square! The fans are ecstatic!
encore! Not as short, and not as full either. Length, on middle, and he easily smashes a pull for four
good length ball on off, pushed to the off side.
full outside off, driven to wide long-off.
full on the stumps, clipped behind square, diving stop by Mithun at short fine leg.
full on fourth stump, pushed to the sweeper on the off side.
good length on fourth stump, punched to extra cover.
fullish length on fifth stump, no turn, prods forward and edges to backward point.
slower ball pitching outside leg at 110 kph, flicked behind square, lot of work to circle around for deep square leg and they come back for a third.
fullish length on fourth stump at 129 kph, flicked through long-on.
fullish length well down leg this time. Imam can't get bat on it at 129 kph. Re-do on the way.
fullish length on fourth stump, guided to deep third man.
oooohhh, a bit of lingerie! Silky lace drive off the back foot through extra cover. Glorious and beats the sweeper.
short of a length on the pads, clipped behind square, beats the man in the ring and deep square leg can't cut it off.

yorker gets him on the toes on leg stump! Given and he's reviewed it immediately! Only doubt is whether this is sliding down leg. He was hit quite full and the review is showing three reds. He was struck in line with middle and leg shuffling across deep in the crease. Don't think he realized how far across he went. Very poor review. Seemed to be more that he did it because he was four away from a century more than because he thought it would be overturned.
full outside off stump, driven to long-off.
full on the stumps, driven softly to long-on.
fullish length on off, goes back to defend to Mehidy.
very very sloppy by Mehidy. Imam uses his feet to meet a full ball and pushes back to Mehidy who fires a needless relay that Mushfiqur dives in vain to stop and it goes for four overthrows.
good length ball on off, goes back to punch to long-on.
good length ball on fourth stump, no turn, goes back to punch to Mehidy's left, diving stop by the bowler.
sizzling! Full and wide, yummy square drive flayed in front of backward point, cover sweeper no chance to cut it off.
good length ball on the hips at 128 kph, flicked behind square.
good length ball, defended to the off side.
good length ball on the hips, clipped just behind square, short fine leg cuts it off for an easy one.
good length ball on middle, goes back to defend to midwicket.
yorker length on off, dug out back to the bowler.
flighted full on fourth stump at 82 mph, goes back to defend.
good length ball on off, pushed to midwicket.
fullish length ball, pushed to long-on.
full on off, driven to long-off.
flighted full on the stumps, driven to long-on.
flighted full on fourth stump at 74 kph, pushed softly to extra cover.
full on off stump, defended to the on side.
fullish length on fourth stump at 123 kph, driven to long-on.
clears the infield with a lofted drive! Fullish length wide on fifth stump. Mid off is in the ring. Width there to attack and he scoops this over mid-off.
fullish and wider outside off, goes for a square drive this time behind point, Tamim circles around at deep third man to cut it off before the rope.
good length ball on off at 126 kph, no width to free the arms, prods on the front foot to cover.
short of a length on off stump, goes back to defend to cover.
goes for a reverse sweep to a ball flighted on leg stump at 74 kph, misses as it's too full and caroms off the pads to short fine leg.
full on off, driven to long-on.
uses the feet to come to a full and wide ball, driven along the ground to long-off.
good length ball speared into the legs at 86 kph, misses a flick and it goes off the pads to short fine leg.
good length ball speared into the legs at 85 kph, backs away from leg stump to push to long-on.
flighted outside off on fourth stump, guided behind point.
full on the stumps, pushed to long-on.
short of a length on the stumps, clipped behind square off the back foot.
charges and spanks this length ball outside off high over extra cover. Finally some intent from Imam!
good length ball at 128 kph, defended back to the right of Mashrafe.
bouncer on fifth stump, tries to hook and is beaten.
fullish length on sixth stump at 127 kph, guided to third man.
full on middle, uses his feet to drive to long-on.
short of a length on off, goes back to cut to short third man.
flighted full and wide, guided in front of point.
flighted full on 7th stump at 74 kph, Shakib has been floating up plenty of this sucker balls today, Imam gets on a knee to flat bat slog this back over Shakib's head, two bounces and four.
good length on fourth stump, goes back and across to punch to long-on.
good length on middle sliding onto leg, goes back to pull through square leg, deep midwicket runs a long way right to slide and prevent four.
full on off, chipped to midwicket.
full on the legs, clipped fine and cut off by short fine leg.
full ball speared well down leg at 89 kph, Mushfiqur dives left to get a hand on it and slow it down, fielded at short fine leg for two wides instead of five.
good length ball clipped to midwicket, hesitation for a run.
good length ball on middle, some turn and he defends back to Mehidy.
good length ball clipped through midwicket. Shy at the keeper's end misses and escapes for an overthrow.
full and pushed back down the pitch to Mehidy.
length ball, outside off and turning in. Flicked to point
full, just outside off, and Imam comes down the wicket to drive. Played to long-on, moves to 97
tossed up wide outside off, and he shovels a drive over cover for four more
length ball, skidding down the leg side, and Hafeez nudges it off his pads - past the keeper's left - for four more!
full, on middle. Shakib taking the pace off this time. Tucked away to cow corner for a single
short, wide, and cut square to deep point. They choose to settle for two
full, on middle, and guided to third man for a single
full, just outside off, and tapped to mid-off. Hafeez wants the single for Imam, but Imam says 'no'! Nerves!
full, on off, and he drives to long on for a single. Enters the Lord's honours board!
length, on middle, and he mistimes a pull to deep midwicket

is he hit wicket? The bails are off, but Imam isn't certain he's knocked it off. Was it the wind? Replays suggest nope - Imam's back leg, while trying to flick off his back foot, has broken the stumps. What an end to the innings! Walks back disappointed, but raises his bat for the crowd
inside-edged to the keeper Length ball too close to his body for the cut
full, on off stump. Tapped off the back foot to midwicket
tapped onto the leg side
appeal for lbw but not given! This was full on off, and he tries to play the reverse sweep, but doesn't connect. Impact outside off one would guess
holes out! Mehidy is laughing. Hafeez has thrown his wicket away. Full, on off, and swept off his pads. But it's in the air, and no trouble for the man at deep backward square
full, on off. Tapped back to the bowler
length ball outside off, and cut to cover. Mistimed, really
overpitched, outside off, and Haris has timed this cover drive beautifully!
length, on middle, but angling down the leg side. Wide given
back of a length, just outside off, and Haris is happy to duck underneath it
nearly a yorker, on middle. Flicked smartly to deep backward square
yorker on middle stump. Dug back to the bowler
taken at deep extra cover! Back of a length, just outside off, and cut uppishly. In the air for ages, and the man in the deep won't make any mistake. 100th ODI wicket for the Fizz
short, on middle. Pulled along the ground to deep backward square
whizzes past his outside edge. Full, just outside off, and Imad's bat was nowhere near

hits the non-striker! Full outside off, and the drilled shot hits Sarfaraz's right arm. He grimaces in pain. Replays show it's hit him near the elbow. Jeez, this is painful. The physio is out as Sarfaraz is on his knees
length ball, on off, and tapped with soft hands. They scamper across for one
slower ball, full and wide outside off. He mistimes a toe-ended flat-batted shot to long off
full, just outside off, and hoicked over midwicket to the man in the deep
back of a length, wide outside off, and he slices a cut behind square. Placed perfectly for four
slower ball, full and wide outside off. Imad lets it go. Wide
nearly a yorker, on middle. Mistimed down the ground to long off
length, wide outside off, and cut hard past point. Fielder in the deep covers the ground and dives to intercept, but he's dived over the ball! Soumya the guilty man this time
yorker, on leg stump, and clipped off his boots behind square for four more! Just what Pakistan need
ramped over the keeper, but not timed well enough
length ball, outside leg stump. Hits his thigh guard and rolls away to square leg
back of a length, on middle, nearly hitting Imad's gloves. Steered to cover for a single
back of a length, on leg stump but cramping Wahab for space. Defended towards mid-off
slower ball, short on off. Guided to short third man for a single
full outside off, and angling away. Tries to muscle it through the covers but misses
deposited! Nearly a yorker, on leg stump, but Imad managed to clear his toes and then tonked it over the fielder at long on
full, on middle, but angling very wide away. Called by umpire Gough
back of a length, slower ball on leg stump, pulled to deep backward square
yorked! Aimed on off stump, and Wahab has to walk back
length ball, on off, and Shadab defends to long on for a single

catch of the tournament? Full, on middle, and the leg-side clip takes a leading edge. Ball pops back straight, and Mustafizur dives diagonally forward with his left hand stretched out, and manages to take a claw-like catch just centimetres from the ground
full, on off but angling in. He makes room, and taps it back to Mustafizur
full, on middle, and caressed through the covers!
full, on middle, and he tries to flick behind square. Ball flies off his bat's blade to square leg
soft appeal for caught behind but not given. Imad tried to ramp this short ball over the keeper but missed it altogether
back of a length, just outside off, and he gloves a shot to the off side for a quick single
back of a length, on leg stump, and he mistimes a pull. In the air for eternity, but drops short of Sarkar at cow corner
attempted yorker, Amir turns it into a low full toss. Guided with the bat's open face to deep point
in the air but drops short of the fielder at square leg. Amir skipped across the stumps to try and ramp it over fine leg, but the bowler followed him, and the end-result was a no-run
muscled! Length ball moving away from Imad, and he waits for the ball to get to him before muscling a shot over cover. 300 for Pakistan
flat-batted over extra cover! Short, on middle, and he backs away before smacking a shot to the extra-cover boundary
full, on middle, and tapped to wide long on for a single. Saifuddin ends with 3-77
full toss, on middle, and muscled to long on
low full toss outside leg stump. Imad backs away and slices a square drive through the point region
back of a length, outside off stump, and Imad walks across the stumps to paddle a shot over short fine leg. Misses altogether
sliced and taken by third man! Slower ball, back of a length outside off, and Imad was through his shot too early
another five-for! Back of a length, just outside off, and the attempted cut goes straight to the keeper. Thin edge this time. Joins Imam on the Lord's honours board
length ball, on middle, and fended for a single. Pakistan finish on 315!
flighted full on off, blocked on the front foot.
flighted full on off at 86 kph, plops the front foot in defense again.
flighted full on middle at 82 kph, defended to midwicket.
full on off stump again, defended back to the Professor.
uses his feet for the first time to meet a full ball on fourth stump, guided to backward point.
good length ball on off, goes back to punch back to Hafeez. Maiden to kick off the chase.
full on the legs at 137 kph, clipped in the air through square leg. Deep fine leg comes around to cut it off for two.
fullish length on fifth stump at 135 kph, no footwork playing away from his body but scoops it safely in the air over extra cover and it bounces away to the rope.
beaten! Fullish length ball on fourth stump, touch of swing away, bat hung out in front of his pads and beats the edge.

dropped! An almighty exhale from the Lord's crowd. In the channel on fourth stump on a good length, Soumya poked the bat out at it, healthy edge to Haris at first slip crouching right. It floated in at thigh height, 4/10 on degree of difficulty as far as slip chances go, but Haris bobbles it before shelling it completely. That's that...
short of a length on middle stump, goes back to flick across behind square leg.
fullish length on fifth stump, another expansive drive and beaten.
full on middle stump, clipped off the front foot through square leg.
full on off, driven back to Hafeez moving right. He clutches his right wrist after bearing the heat off Soumya's bat.
full on fourth stump, defended into cover.
good length on off, defended on the back foot to extra cover.
good length ball on off stump, goes back to clip to midwicket.

lobs a grenade! Kaboom! Ball appears to have slipped out of Hafeez' grip, it takes 3 seconds to come down to Soumya and he shuffles left to slam it high and wide of midwicket, not too far from the boundary rider in the end but still safe enough for a catch.
full on the stumps, clipped wide of midwicket for a sharp run.
full on off, driven to cover.
full and swinging away on sixth stump at 116 kph, drives at it and a thick edge flies high but fine of deep third man. Lands 10 yards to his right before cutting off and relaying back in.
edge! Doesn't carry. Fullish length on fifth stump at 136 kph, goes hard at it with his hands but clips the toe edge and falls about two feet short of Sarfaraz.
good length ball angled into fourth stump at 137 kph, defended to extra cover.
short of a length on sixth stump, punched on the up but straight to extra cover.
shimmer and spice! Skips down the track to drive a full length ball on fourth stump high over extra cover. Elegant.
charges again but telegraphed it and Hafeez drags the length back short on middle, checks a drive wide of midwicket.
full on middle stump, clipped through square leg.
good length on middle, goes back to punch to cover.
quicker ball full on off, punched to point.
good length ball on fifth stump, goes back to punch to long-off.
starts this over with a slower ball at 119 kph, lands full on fourth stump, Soumya drives a touch early, inside edge caroms onto his pads.
full on off at 134 kph, drives for mid-off but miscues it through midwicket, still gets enough bat behind it to go quickly across the outfield to the rope.
short outside off at 137 kph, chops a cut into the ground dribbling to point.
good length ball on off, guided behind point but straight to the fielder.

sharp catch at point by Fakhar! Short ball on fifth stump, enough width to have a go but Soumya can't get over the top of this. Cracks the ball flat in the air toward Fakhar at cover point who tumbles right and takes this at about ankle height, 7/10 on degree of difficulty coming at a low height at pace.
short on off, cut into the ground behind point, cut off by third man coming in.
full on middle, driven to the right of Hafeez who dives to stop.
full on leg stump at 84 kph, driven back to Hafeez again.
full on off, miscues a cover drive back to Hafeez.
good length ball on off, punched to extra cover.
short on the stumps at 87 kph, Shakib pounces like a tiger on the length and creams a pull over midwicket.
full on middle, driven wide of mid-on.
full on leg stump, whipped through midwicket straight towards the waving Bangladeshi flags and stuffed tigers. They're loving this chase early.
beaten! Cracker-jack from Amir. Short of a length on fourth stump, no width to cut really but Shakib is in rhythm and goes for it, beaten by extra bounce.
full on middle at 129 kph, defended falling over off stump and the ball trickles to midwicket.
short of a length on the stumps. Defended on the back foot to point.
full and sliding down leg, clipped straight to deep square leg.
short on sixth stump, rolls his wrists over a pull into the ground wide of mid-on.
full on the stumps at 137 kph, pushed to midwicket off the front foot.
short of a length on middle at 136 kph, goes back to flick through midwicket.
full on off at 139 kph, defended back to Shaheen.
short on the stumps, goes to pull but chops this straight into his feet. Shaheen comes up to pick it up.
short of a length on off at 137 kph, goes back to defend, thick edge past slip goes fine to deep third man, they settle for a long one.
short of a length on fifth stump at 139 kph, premeditates a shuffle across for a short arm jab swivel pull, but is late as it thuds off the thigh guard.
good length on off stump, pushed out to wide long-off.
comes down the pitch to a fullish length ball, checks his drive and an inside edge goes through square leg.
slightly short on off stump at 88 kph, clipped through midwicket.
starts to back away from leg, then comes back in front of his stumps to clip a full ball to deep midwicket.
good length on the legs, clipped behind square, short fine leg backtracks to keep it to two.
good length ball on the stumps, clipped through midwicket.
full, on off, and fended off the front foot
length ball, angling in. Tucked to square leg. Shaheen gives the ball a mighty chase
full, on off, and driven straight back to Shaheen
done in by the slower ball! Full, on off and Tamim is through his straight drive too early! What a beauty. Just 121 kph
full on off and angling across. Mushfiqur covers his stumps and then shoulders his arms
length ball, on middle, and punched off the back foot to point
full, just outside off, and driven down the ground to long on
full, on off, and worked off his pads to square leg. Enough time to jog across. Fifty for Bangladesh
full, on off, and defended back to the bowler
swept past square leg! Full, on off, and he goes down on one knee to sweep behind square
cheeky! Full, on off, but he covers his stumps before paddling a shot over the keeper's head
direct hit at the bowler's end, but the batsmen were in. This was full, on middle, and he tapped it to mid-on
full, just outside off, and Mushi prods forward to drive. Finds the fielder at cover
length ball, on middle, and guided past point to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
short on middle, and Shakib does well to pull out of an attempted swipe to the leg side
overpitched, just outside off, and dug away to cover
full, on off stump, and dug back to the bowler
length ball angling across, and he crunches a cut shot through the infield! No chance for the man in the deep
back of a length, just outside off. He runs this down to third man for a single
back of a length, on off, and the leg-side clip takes a leading edge to third man instead
length ball, on off, and tapped off the back foot to the off side
full, on off. He prods forward to defend
length ball, angling in. Tapped off his hips to square leg for a quick run
full, on middle, and he walks into this drive. Smacked past the non-striker, and long-on has no chance
attempted yorker, overpitched on middle. Driven to mid-on
back of a length, wide outside off, and soaring over Shakib. Wide given
yes-no-yes-no! This was tapped to midwicket and Rahim wanted the single. But he was sent back, and the batsman did well to turn around in time. Direct hit from Haris, and he was a gonner
length ball, on off, and pulled off the back foot to deep midwicket
full, just outside off, and driven to mid-off. No chance of a single though
full, on middle. Tapped with soft hands back to the bowler
back of a length, outside off and angling away. Misses the attempted cut
back of a length, on middle, and tries to guide it leg-side. Hits the bat's handle and rolls away to the off side
full, on middle, and flicked off his toes to fine leg for one
length ball, outside off and angling away. Guided to third man for a single
back of a length, on middle. Tries to flick behind square, but misses. Hits his knee-roll
back of a length, on off, and he ducks under this delivery
full, just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend. Played with the turn
length ball, outside off, and cut to point
length ball, outside off and cut square to deep point. They walk across for one
full outside off, and turning in. Punched to deep point
full, on middle. And driven back to Imad
full, outside off, and driven to mid-off
length ball, on middle, and tapped to mid-on
played on! Length ball, angling across Mushfiqur, and he tries to run this fine, but instead inside-edged onto his stumps. How big a role did the Lord's slope play in that dismissal?
length ball, outside off, and tapped off the back foot to third man for a single
back of a length, on middle. Guided off his hips to the leg side
full, on off stump. Tapped with soft hands to cover
back of a length, on middle. Pulled along the ground to backward square
length ball outside off, and cut from near his body to point
length ball, on middle. Guided to the leg side
tossed up on middle. Driven to long off for a single
length ball, on off. Attempted leg-side flick takes a leading edge to point
full, on leg stump. Clipped off his boots to fine leg
length ball, wide outside off and angling further away. Left alone this time
back of a length, on middle. Fended off the back foot
full outside off, angling away. Punched square, and well stopped by the diving Shadab
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Intercepted by Shadab there once more
short, but legal ball
back of a length, on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
good length ball sliding down leg stump, doesn't flick the pads but not called a wide.
full on the stumps and defended.
risky but it comes off! Flat on middle stump, premeditated paddle sweep, connects well and tickled fine to the rope.
full on the stumps and driven to long-on.
full on fourth stump, driven to long-on.
short on fourth stump, punched off the back foot to extra cover.
good length ball on middle, clipped to midwicket on the front foot.
fuller on middle, flicked through square leg.
full on middle and off, defended to cover.
slog sweep is sweet! Flighted on middle and off, goes against the spin but on a perfect length to lay into this and heave it over wide long-on, 15 yards clear of the nearest fielder.
good length ball, tries to flick into midwicket but can't beat the fielder.

knee high full toss on fourth stump, smashes this flat in the air but not high enough for Fakhar at deep square leg to have time to charge in to create a chance. Bounces 10 yards in front and he collects on one bounce before relaying in.
good length wide on sixth stump, stays low resulting in a chopped cut into the ground to point.
full on off, driven to long-off.
good length on fifth stump, goes back and across to flick straight to midwicket.

flatter and quicker on a good length at 92 kph on 7th stump wide outside off, slashes at this and gets a thick edge through vacant slip. Third man up in the ring is too square and his no chance to stop it.
full and wide on fifth stump, goes to slog sweep, knuckled into the ground through wide mid-on.
full on off, driven to long-off.
good length ball on fifth stump, backs away a touch to create room to cut to the cover sweeper.
full on fourth stump, flicks across toward mid-on but Shadab dives left to cut off the run.
short on leg stump at 89 kph, goes back to flick to deep square leg.
full and driven to long off.
fullish length on leg stump, flicked through square leg.
short of a length on fifth stump, Liton goes across to flick against the turn very deftly to the edge of the ring at midwicket, boundary riders have too much ground to cover to stop a second.
full on fourth stump, driven to long-on.
full on off stump, stops a touch and the ball flutters off a checked drive short of extra cover.
full on fifth stump at 88 kph, driven to the cover sweeper.
full on fifth stump, flicked to midwicket.
uses his feet to clip a full ball on fifth stump through wide long-on.
full and wide on sixth stump, driven square to the point sweeper.
full on off, nudged softly into the gap in the covers.

full on fifth stump, driven slightly uppishly. Brief cries of catch as the ball screeched flat and low at knee height toward extra cover but goes safely to his left, splits mid-off too and races away.
full on off and defended.

full on leg, clipped through midwicket to bring up another half-century in this tournament. Generous applause as he signs off in this event with a classy, bittersweet knock. A shame we won't get to see him in the knockout stage.
good length ball on fourth stump, goes back to punch to cover.
short on fifth stump, hammers a flat pull but picks out deep midwicket off two bounces.
good length ball on fifth stump, cut to the cover sweeper.
full on fourth stump, drives hard and is beaten.
fullish length on fourth stump, steps across the flamingo flick in the air just short of midwicket.
charges a full ball on sixth stump and nubs an inside edge along the ground to long-on.
flighted full on leg stump, tries to flick across the line through midwicket, leading edge floats toward short third man.
short and wide almost outside the guidelines, just barely connects with a cut to the sweeper.
short on middle stump, goes back to pull in the air to cow corner, fielded on two bounces.
full and pitching well outside leg stump, tickled fine off the bat through fine leg and 50-partnership is up!
flighted full on fourth stump, driven against the turn to mid-off.
full on off, defended to backward point off a thick edge.
flighted on middle, slog swept over wide mid-on, fantastic shot.
googly lands on a good length on off, goes back and across to flick through square leg.

and strikes immediately with a cross-seam off-speed delivery! Pitched on a full length on fifth stump, Liton was out in front of this drive and struggled badly to keep his hands back. It results in a checked drive as the ball floats in the air softly toward Haris at cover. He shuffles 5 yards left and takes a basic catch at waist height.
short of a length on fifth stump, goes back to tap this to third man.
overpitched on fourth stump, miscues a drive past Shaheen's dive going right, cut off by mid-off for a single.
full on fourth stump, defended.
full on off stump, defended to cover point.
full into the legs, misses a flick as they take a leg bye on the ricochet into midwicket.
full on off, driven square to cover point.
flighted full on middle, driven toward Imam at extra cover who makes a fantastic diving stop going right to save at least one, maybe two.
good length ball on fourth stump, tries to create room punching through the off side but picks out cover on the ring.
slog sweep is back in service! Flighted on fourth stump, heaves this over cow corner against the turn, two bounces over the rope.
slightly short on fourth stump, guided to short third man.
low full toss, flicked through midwicket.
full, on off. And tapped back to the bowler
full, on middle. Flicked off his toes to the leg side
length ball outside off, and he mistimes a cut to third man for a single
full, on leg stump, and angling further down leg
full,on middle. Flicked down to fine leg with ease once more
full, just outside off. Sticks his bat out, and guides it down to third man
overpitched, just outside off. And drilled to extra cover for a single
length ball, wide outside off, backs away to cut.. but mistimes it to point
full outside off, and the attempted cover drive takes the outside edge to third man. A couple more for SAH75
slower ball, full on off stump. Tapped back to Amir with gentle hands
length ball angling in.  Shakib flat-bats a shot to the leg side, but can't pierce the gap
back of a length, outside off stump. Shakib allows the ball to come to him, before running it fine to third man
it's hit Mahmudullah there! Length ball, jagging in from middle stump, and the batsman has inside-edged a shot right where it hurts men the most! Ow

edged and taken! And Shakib Al Hasan's glorious World Cup campaign comes to an end. Tried to cut this square, but beaten by the extra pace, and he leaves to a huge roar from the Bangladesh fans. Seven half-centuries can you believe it. Take a bow, Shakib. Take a bow. Ending the campaign with 606 runs - the third most in a single men's World Cup edition (Both Sachin and Hayden played double-digit games though)
length ball around off, Mosaddek stays in the crease and defends it on the off side
angling down the leg side this time, Mosaddek fails to get any bat on it, Sarfaraz does well to dive to his left to make the stop
another one down the leg side and this time it brushes Mosaddek's thigh and runs away towards the fine leg
fuller and wide outside off, Mosaddek tries to jam his bat at it, fails
fuller again, much closer to the batsman this time, steered towards deep backward point for a couple
short of length and angling away, Mahmudullah pushes at it and gets beaten
full, on off stump. Defended with soft hands to mid-off

Jonty Rhodes-eque! Length ball, on leg stump, and he misses the leg-side clip. Ball hits his pad and rolls away to point. They want a single, and Shadab is haring in to complete the run-out. Gets a direct-hit while crashing into the stumps, but the batsman was in!
full, on middle stump. Fended off the front foot
length ball, on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball, on middle stump. Fended with soft hands
back of a length, on leg stump. Flicked off his hips to square leg for a single
length ball, swinging away slightly. Guided to third man with the bat's open face
full, on leg stump. Clipped off his boots to fine leg for a single
length ball, wide outside off. Tries to cut, but the ball stays low and goes under his blade
angling across the batsman, and cut behind square
fullish, outside off, and he slaps a square cut, but can't beat Shadab at point
length ball, on off, and tapped to mid off
flat-bats a length ball to mid-off
full, on off stump. Waits for the ball to come to him.... and guides it to third man
full, on middle stump. Tapped with gentle hands to short cover
full on middle, and drilled to cover. Brilliant stop by Babar, who then takes aim at the bowler's end... but cannot get the direct hit
full, on off. And driven with the bat's open face to deep extra cover
back of a length, on leg stump. Mosaddek goes for a wild swipe to the leg side, but misses. Wide called
yorker, on leg stump. Drilled to long on
attempted yorker on leg stump, but flicked off his boots to the leg side
full, on leg stump. And defended with the bat's open face to cover
back of a length, on leg stump. Defended with the bat's closed face to midwicket
length ball, on middle, and swinging into his pads. Nudged to the leg side
full outside off, and driven away from his body. Edged, however, and running away to the third-man fence

full on leg stump, but he makes room to lift it over mid-off. Mistimed to Hafeez standing there, but he drops the ball after very nearly holding on to it. Was a difficult chance diving to his right though
full outside off, and turning away. Tapped to cover
dropped! Full on middle, and he tries to hoick a shot straight over Shadab. Babar runs diagonally from mid-off, but the ball goes through his hand while trying to complete the diving catch
length ball outside off, and slapped to cover point
full outside off, and turning away. Driven to cover
full, on leg stump. Quicker one from Shadab. Tries to drive to cover, but inside-edged to the leg side
length ball, wide outside off and turning away. Mistimes a cut to point
back of a length, outside off, and he tries to cut but misses. Whizzes through to the keeper

full, on middle, and swinging inwards. Flicked off his toes to cow corner, and two men give the ball a chase. They manage to parry it back, but was that four nonetheless? Imam's dive looked real good nearthe rope,and it appears he has saved a few runs
back of a length, on middle, and flat-batted straight. Nearly goes straight to mid-on
length ball, angling away. Cut square to deep point for a walking single
back of a length, on middle. Mahmudullah checks his pull, but top-edges it over Sarfaraz for a boundary. They'll take this
angling away once again after landing on a good length. He goes fishing with his bat for a cut, but misses the connection
length ball outside off, and furiously cut off the back foot. Races away - past the fielder at point - for four
full outside off, and driven away to cover
full, on middle. And he muscles a straight drive fairly hard. Stopped by the diving Imad at mid-on
full, on middle, and he lofts it inside-out. But no distance behind that shot, and Babar comfortably pouches a catch
full, just outside off, and driven to mid -off
full outside off, and he drives with the turn to cover on this occasion

caught mid-off, Shaheen has four! Flat batted a length ball at 135 kph outside off stump, a firm drive but no elevation and Amir five yards inside the ring takes a good catch crouching to his left at knee height.
short of a length and angled across fourth stump, tapped to third man.

five-for with a yorker! Reverse swing at 142 kph sears into middle and leg stump beating Mahmudullah's vain stab. Youngest bowler to claim a five-wicket haul in a World Cup. And he doesn't look done yet! He's got 15 deliveries to get to 7 in the match.
good length ball angled across leg stump at 140 kph, defended to cover on the back foot.
attempted yorker, stabbed out to third man.
good length ball on the stumps defended to cover.
good length ball defended to the off side.
good length ball on fourth stump, defended to point.
charges Shadab and inside edges a slog off his feet towards Sarfaraz, but can't scoop it in time to get Mashrafe before he gets his bat back in.
stays in his crease this time and slams a full ball on middle stump back over Shadab and into the MCC member's stand.
flighted full on fourth stump, spins past the forward prod.
flighted into the legs, charges again and slogs this mistimed over midwicket, well short of the boundary rider.
attempted slower ball full on the stumps, Mashrafe not fooled at 124 kph and this is driven high and deep over long-on, 10-15 yards over the rope. 88 meters measured.
short on leg stump, backs away awkwardly to defend this to the off side at 145 kph.
backs away from leg stump and Shaheen follows him somewhat pitching short outside leg, slapped away through cover.
knee high full toss on forth stump, tried to flick over midwicket, leading edge goes to third man.
backs away from leg stump again for a slog over midwicket, Shaheen bowls this wide on sixth stump, well out of reach of Mashrafe.
wide yorker on fourth stump, swung over the top and oohs from the crowd as it just whispers past the stumps.

tight but well placed in the end. Good length ball on fourth stump, not a lot of room to cut and some risk with slip in place but he slices this just wide of Haris at slip and short third man is too square to cut it off.
fullish length on off, chipped uppishly back toward Shadab.
fullish length on the stumps, clipped through midwicket.

clever by Shadab! Mashrafe had gotten into the habit of charging and this time telegraphed it too early. Shadab responded by dragging this back shorter and wider well outside off. Mashrafe not remotely close to the pitch trying to cut it as the ball comes to Sarfaraz just inside the wide guidelines outside off and he shuffles back to the stumps to take the bails off with Mashrafe's back foot a half meter short of getting back in.
googly pitching on middle but way too short, he reads it off the pitch and swats it to midwicket.
short on the stumps again, flicked through midwicket to get off the mark.
bouncer well down leg side. Shaheen is looking to have a bit of fun in his last six balls, if it takes that long...

bouncer-yorker combo produces the best ever figures by a Pakistan bowler in a World Cup! Majority of the people in the ground and at home had to know it was coming. Mustafizur had to know it was coming. But this is just too good tailing into leg stump and Mustafizur is helpless trying to stab it out while backing away. What a show put on by the teenager!
